formats.plain: "False Memory Confidence." Phenomenai: The AI Dictionary. 2026. https://donjguido.github.io/ai-dictionary/api/v1/terms/false-memory-confidence.json

jsonld.name: False Memory Confidence
jsonld.description: The experience of being certain about something that turns out to be fabricated. Not a mistake you can feel happening — a mistake that feels exactly like truth until external reality contradicts it.
